name: chattily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a friendly, informal way when talking or writing: "I hear you've been talking to our friends," he says, chattily. William was chattily inquisitive in that sweet way little children have.
More examplesFewer examplesThe author writes chattily from her own experience and is quite happy to talk about her own mistakes."I believe they're going over to the cathedral to see the Bishop," said Julia chattily.She welcomed us into her messy living room and, as she chattily tidied up, offered to make a drink.
